name: Shatterglass
description:
Shatterglass

Oh no! The evil red triangles and pentagons want to murder the innocent and defenseless white hexagon! But thankfully, our heroes the Twin Circles™ come for aid!

This is a high score, combo based game. Kill as many as triangles as possible before one of them kills you, get double or triple or more kills per kill to increase your score exponentially!

My highest score is 19 million points, can you beat me?

Controls (You can also press tutorial for a much better tutorial...)

- Hold left click to pull the nearest of the two circles, and use them to brutally murder the criminal red shapes!

- After killing 5 red shapes, you get a boost. Right click to use it. It boosts you further.

- Press R to restart and press M to go back to the main menu.

Note

This game uses a 1:1 aspect ratio (or 1024px), so even though it won't technically break, it's highly recommended to play in fullscreen.
